markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Dismissing Activations](/Rules.aspx?ID=693)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 534 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some item effects can be dismissed, ending the duration early due to you or the target taking action. Dismissing an activation requires using the Dismiss action.

<document level="2" id="action-74" />
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Dismissing Activations
search_markdown:
